titles.title: C002 - jiuňdo chan, yeshu jiuňdo chan

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
जिउँदो छन्, येशू जिउँदो छन्,
मेरो मनमा येशू जिउँदो छन्
सङ्कटमा मेरो सहारा हुन्,
येशू सधैं जिउँदो छन्।
jiuňdo chan, yeshu jiuňdo chan,
mero man-maa yeshu jiuňdo chan
sangkaT-maa mero sahaaraa hun,
yeshu sadhaiň jiuňdo chan.
